snippet.title: Piggy Gambit – Release Date Trailer
snippet.description:
Piggy Gambit on Steam: https://store.steampowered.com/app/1340920/Piggy_Gambit/

Piggy Gambit is a game that harmoniously combines the elements of chess, box puzzles, and flow control into a coherent puzzle game about a piggy searching for the meaning to his life.

#gaming #indiegames 
Best Upcoming Indie Game Trailers
